remarks: Equality of equivalence relation in terms of an operation.  (Contributed by NM, 15-Feb-1996.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2015.)
statement:
eceqoveq.5 $e |- .~ Er ( S X. S ) $.
eceqoveq.7 $e |- dom .+ = ( S X. S ) $.
eceqoveq.8 $e |- -. (/) e. S $.
eceqoveq.9 $e |- ( ( x e. S /\ y e. S ) -> ( x .+ y ) e. S ) $.
eceqoveq.10 $e |- ( ( ( A e. S /\ B e. S ) /\ ( C e. S /\ D e. S ) ) -> ( <. A , B >. .~ <. C , D >. <-> ( A .+ D ) = ( B .+ C ) ) ) $.
eceqoveq $p |- ( ( A e. S /\ C e. S ) -> ( [ <. A , B >. ] .~ = [ <. C , D >. ] .~ <-> ( A .+ D ) = ( B .+ C ) ) ) $.
